# Jokes

Jokes...


| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| tags | Comma separated joke tags, ex. `nsfw,dark`. |


`````{tabs}

````{tab} Sample Text

```text
app: jokes 
options: tags = dark
```
````

````{tab} Sample Response

```text
Multiple people have died from Chuck Norris giving them the finger.
```
````
`````
